thread.title: Joel Matip will NOT be in the Liverpool side for FA Cup replay with Plymouth after Fifa eligibility row rumbles on
thread.title_full: Joel Matip will NOT be in the Liverpool side for FA Cup replay with Plymouth after Fifa eligibility row rumbles on

author: whaughton
title: Joel Matip will NOT be in the Liverpool side for FA Cup replay with Plymouth after Fifa eligibility row rumbles on
text:
EFL Matip row goes on Joel Matip will NOT be in the Liverpool side for FA Cup replay with Plymouth after Fifa eligibility row rumbles on 
Despite defender retiring from international football over a year ago and was not called up by Cameroon for the African Cup of Nations Matip is still not allowed to play in FA Cup replay by Phil Thomas
